Class APIRequest

java.lang.Object

public class APIRequest
extends Object

This class encapsulates a Hoiio API request

Method Detail

addParam

public void addParam(String param,
                     String value)
This method allows a user to add request parameters and their corresponding value. If a param already exists, then it will be overridden by the new value specified in the method call.

Parameters:
param - The parameter name.
value - The value of the parameter.

getParam

This method allows a user to retrieve an added parameter's value

Parameters:
param - The parameter name
